comment:
* Class that contains windowing configuration/state for other objects that contain windows directly
 * or indirectly. E.g. Activities, Task, Displays, ...
 * The test class is {@link com.android.server.wm.WindowConfigurationTests} which must be kept
 * up-to-date and ran anytime changes are made to this class.
 * @hide

variables.name: mBounds
variables.comment:
* bounds that can differ from app bounds, which may include things such as insets.
     *
     * TODO: Investigate combining with {@link #mAppBounds}. Can the latter be a product of the
     * former?

variables.name: mAppBounds
variables.comment:
* {@link android.graphics.Rect} defining app bounds. The dimensions override usages of
     * {@link DisplayInfo#appHeight} and {@link DisplayInfo#appWidth} and mirrors these values at
     * the display level. Lower levels can override these values to provide custom bounds to enforce
     * features such as a max aspect ratio.

variables.name: mRotation
variables.comment:
* The current rotation of this window container relative to the default
     * orientation of the display it is on (regardless of how deep in the hierarchy
     * it is). It is used by the configuration hierarchy to apply rotation-dependent
     * policy during bounds calculation.

variables.name: ROTATION_UNDEFINED
variables.comment: Rotation is not defined, use the parent containers rotation.

variables.name: mWindowingMode
variables.comment: The current windowing mode of the configuration.

variables.name: mDisplayWindowingMode
variables.comment: The display windowing mode of the configuration

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_UNDEFINED
variables.comment: Windowing mode is currently not defined.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_FULLSCREEN
variables.comment: Occupies the full area of the screen or the parent container.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_PINNED
variables.comment: Always on-top (always visible). of other siblings in its parent container.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_SPLIT_SCREEN_PRIMARY
variables.comment: TODO: Remove once split-screen is migrated to wm-shell.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_SPLIT_SCREEN_SECONDARY
variables.comment: TODO: Remove once split-screen is migrated to wm-shell.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_FULLSCREEN_OR_SPLIT_SCREEN_SECONDARY
variables.comment: TODO: Remove once split-screen is migrated to wm-shell.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_FREEFORM
variables.comment: TODO: Remove once freeform is migrated to wm-shell.

variables.name: WINDOWING_MODE_MULTI_WINDOW
variables.comment: Generic multi-window with no presentation attribution from the window manager.

variables.name: mActivityType
variables.comment: The current activity type of the configuration.

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_UNDEFINED
variables.comment: Activity type is currently not defined.

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_STANDARD
variables.comment: Standard activity type. Nothing special about the activity...

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_HOME
variables.comment: Home/Launcher activity type.

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_RECENTS
variables.comment: Recents/Overview activity type. There is only one activity with this type in the system.

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_ASSISTANT
variables.comment: Assistant activity type.

variables.name: ACTIVITY_TYPE_DREAM
variables.comment: Dream activity type.

variables.name: mAlwaysOnTop
variables.comment: The current always on top status of the configuration.

variables.name: ALWAYS_ON_TOP_UNDEFINED
variables.comment: Always on top is currently not defined.

variables.name: ALWAYS_ON_TOP_ON
variables.comment: Always on top is currently on for this configuration.

variables.name: ALWAYS_ON_TOP_OFF
variables.comment: Always on top is currently off for this configuration.

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_BOUNDS
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mBounds} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_APP_BOUNDS
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mAppBounds} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_WINDOWING_MODE
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mWindowingMode} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_ACTIVITY_TYPE
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mActivityType} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_ALWAYS_ON_TOP
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mAlwaysOnTop} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_ROTATION
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mRotation} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: WINDOW_CONFIG_DISPLAY_WINDOWING_MODE
variables.comment:
Bit that indicates that the {@link #mDisplayWindowingMode} changed.
     * @hide

variables.name: PINNED_WINDOWING_MODE_ELEVATION_IN_DIP
variables.comment: @hide

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment: @hide

public void setBounds(Rect rect)
methods.comment:
* Sets the bounds to the provided {@link Rect}.
     * @param rect the new bounds value.

methods.name: public void setAppBounds(Rect rect)
methods.comment:
* Set {@link #mAppBounds} to the input Rect.
     * @param rect The rect value to set {@link #mAppBounds} to.
     * @see #getAppBounds()

public void setAppBounds(int left, int top, int right, int bottom)
methods.comment:
* @see #setAppBounds(Rect)
     * @see #getAppBounds()
     * @hide

methods.comment: @see #setAppBounds(Rect)

methods.name: public Rect getBounds()
methods.comment: @see #setBounds(Rect)

methods.comment:
Set this object to completely undefined.
     * @hide

methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int updateFrom(@NonNull WindowConfiguration delta)
public void setTo(@NonNull WindowConfiguration delta, @WindowConfig int mask)
methods.comment:
* Copies the fields specified by mask from delta into this Configuration object.
     * @hide

methods.name: public long diff(WindowConfiguration other, boolean compareUndefined)
methods.comment:
* Return a bit mask of the differences between this Configuration object and the given one.
     * Does not change the values of either. Any undefined fields in <var>other</var> are ignored.
     * @param other The configuration to diff against.
     * @param compareUndefined If undefined values should be compared.
     * @return Returns a bit mask indicating which configuration
     * values has changed, containing any combination of {@link WindowConfig} flags.
     *
     * @see Configuration#diff(Configuration)
     * @hide

methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public int hashCode()
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public String toString()
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public void dumpDebug(ProtoOutputStream protoOutputStream, long fieldId)
methods.comment:
* Write to a protocol buffer output stream.
     * Protocol buffer message definition at {@link android.app.WindowConfigurationProto}
     *
     * @param protoOutputStream Stream to write the WindowConfiguration object to.
     * @param fieldId           Field Id of the WindowConfiguration as defined in the parent message
     * @hide

methods.name: public void readFromProto(ProtoInputStream proto, long fieldId) throws IOException, WireTypeMismatchException
methods.comment:
* Read from a protocol buffer input stream.
     * Protocol buffer message definition at {@link android.app.WindowConfigurationProto}
     *
     * @param proto   Stream to read the WindowConfiguration object from.
     * @param fieldId Field Id of the WindowConfiguration as defined in the parent message
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean hasWindowShadow()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the activities associated with this window configuration display a shadow
     * around their border.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean hasWindowDecorCaption()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the activities associated with this window configuration display a decor
     * view.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean canResizeTask()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the tasks associated with this window configuration can be resized
     * independently of their parent container.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean persistTaskBounds()
methods.comment:
Returns true if the task bounds should persist across power cycles.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean tasksAreFloating()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the tasks associated with this window configuration are floating.
     * Floating tasks are laid out differently as they are allowed to extend past the display bounds
     * without overscan insets.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean isFloating(int windowingMode)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the windowingMode represents a floating window.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean inMultiWindowMode(int windowingMode)
methods.comment:
* Returns {@code true} if the windowingMode represents a window in multi-window mode.
     * I.e. sharing the screen with another activity.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean isSplitScreenWindowingMode(int windowingMode)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the windowingMode represents a split window.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean canReceiveKeys()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the windows associated with this window configuration can receive input keys.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean isAlwaysOnTop()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the container associated with this window configuration is always-on-top of
     * its siblings.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean keepVisibleDeadAppWindowOnScreen()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if any visible windows belonging to apps with this window configuration should
     * be kept on screen when the app is killed due to something like the low memory killer.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean useWindowFrameForBackdrop()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the backdrop on the client side should match the frame of the window.
     * Returns false, if the backdrop should be fullscreen.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean windowsAreScaleable()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if this container may be scaled without resizing, and windows within may need
     * to be configured as such.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean hasMovementAnimations()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if windows in this container should be given move animations by default.
     * @hide

methods.name: public boolean supportSplitScreenWindowingMode()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if this container can be put in either
     * {@link #WINDOWING_MODE_SPLIT_SCREEN_PRIMARY} or
     * {@link #WINDOWING_MODE_SPLIT_SCREEN_SECONDARY} windowing modes based on its current state.
     * @hide

methods.name: public static boolean supportSplitScreenWindowingMode(int activityType)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public static String windowingModeToString(@WindowingMode int windowingMode)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public static String activityTypeToString(@ActivityType int applicationType)
methods.comment: @hide

methods.name: public static String alwaysOnTopToString(@AlwaysOnTop int alwaysOnTop)
methods.comment: @hide
